title: Train fault causing delays on North-South Line

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #RafflesPlace towards #MarinaBay are now operating normally.
[NSL]UPDATE:Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #Newton to #MarinaBay towards MarinaBay due to an earlier train fault.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #RafflesPlace to #MarinaBay towards MarinaBay due to train fault.
